Sections.Name: GeneralSettings
Sections.Description: general mod settings (enable or disable features)

Keys.Name: TerrainTransition
Keys.Description: enable terrain transition between near and distant terrain

Keys.Name: FadeIntoSkybox
Keys.Description: enable fading into sky box of distant terrain

Keys.Name: SeaReflections
Keys.Description: enable sea reflections (Realtime Reflections mod must be present)

Sections.Name: ImprovedTerrainSettings
Sections.Description: enable or disable additional terrain features

Keys.Name: EnableImprovedTerrain
Keys.Description: enable improved terrain (improves heightmap, e.g. higher mountains)

Keys.Name: IndicateLocations
Keys.Description: indicate locations as bright spots on terrain texture
